close_microwave_door.description: Close the microwave door by swinging it to the closed position.

open_microwave_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it to the open position.

microwave_door_status.description: Microwave door is already closed, no actions needed.

clean_rotation_tray.description: Cleaning the microwave rotation tray to remove any spills.

clean_microwave_body.description: Cleaning the outer body of the microwave to remove any dust.

clean_microwave_door.description: Clean the microwave door to keep it transparent.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the body, door, and rotation tray.

operate_microwave.description: Operate the microwave by opening the door, rotating the tray and then closing the door.
